title: More Tales to Tremble By
description: A second collection of great stories of haunting and suspense. 	The Red Lodge, by H. R. Wakefield. 		Sredni Vashtar, by Saki. 		Thurnley Abbey, by P. Landon. 		"God grante that she lye stille", by C. Asquith. 		The voice in the night, by W. H. Hodgson. 		The extra passenger, by A. Derleth. 		Casting the runes, by M. R. James. 		The book, by M. Irwin.
author: Stephen P. Sutton
